EN:

So, after a long time, I made a new sight, and this time, it's the hungarian RMI-1 X/H prototype plane from late ww2

Works with all tanks (if you put it in the "all_tanks" folder)

tutorial on how to install:

https://youtu.be/nekHNX2FRDs?t=22

HU:

Szóval, hosszú idő után, itt egy új irányzék, és most az a (Repülő Műszaki Intézet) RMI-1 prototípus repülőgépének a köre van

mindegyik harckocsival működik (ha az "all_tanks" mappába teszed az "UserSights" mappában, ami a config-al egy mappában van)

AUBL 74 Daebom
#aubl #daebom #anime

#sight #niko #oneshot #alltanks #spotter #pancake
Niko Spotter Sight 2!

This goob is here to help you aim (again)

And also attempting to help with your tunnel vision!

HOW TO INSTALL:

1. Extract the zip file

2. Go to the War Thunder folder and click "User Sights"

3. Make a file and name it "all_tanks"

4. Copy and paste the sight in the "all_tanks" folder

5. Boot up War Thunder and go into "Sight Settings" (options < ground vehicle battle settings)

6. Have fun!

DO NOT GOON TO THIS, OR I'LL BURN YOUR HOUSE DOWN

Французы .
#mge

i decided to still poste Girl 1 one so here you have it

MBG = mega big
x = on cross hair
up +left/right = the png is over the horizotal line and Left/right
down+left/right = same as up but inverted
BG = Big
SPAA = sight made spesific for SPAA
Cross = custom cross with png
CrossPLus = custom cross with extar sight setings and png
Tail = Tail is on cross hair
Boobs= ther on the horizontal line
